term.title: alternancy symmetry

item.text: A topological property of the molecular graphs of alternanthydrocarbons which allows the carbon atoms to be divided into two subsets in such a way that no two atoms of the same subset are adjacent. A consequence of this property is the symmetrical arrangement of the energy levels of bonding and antibonding HÃ¼ckel MOs relative to the level of a nonbonding orbital (energy level of the p AO of a carbon atom).
